div.p: O78/12605, unit 1040, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: Form completed by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate *
of Expenditure during the two months
Two months over Quarter struck through.
ending 30th November 1 878.
